google_play_reviews.content: For about 1 week I was trying to meditate properly by having some white noise but I was too distracted by looking at how much time was left until I found Medito. I would suggest it for anyone whether experienced or begining. Just try it out for youself and have a taste.

google_play_reviews.content: The only open-source meditation app I could find! They have really put a lot of effort into incorporating feedback for their users and making the app the best it can be. Pros: open source! Incorporates feedback! Growing community! Great selection of mediations! Cons: the only thing they're missing is an interval bell within the mediation (e.g. every 5 minutes in a 20 minute meditation) Edit: they've fixed lots of old problems!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nick! Thanks for your review, the problem with the session stopping is due to Android phones aggressively killing background processes. Lots of users have luck with the instructions at dontkillmyapp.com Please let us know if you do too ‚ò∫Ô∏è take care, Mike

google_play_reviews.content: Wonderful App. Really enjoyable 5* experience.
What happened :( this was my favorite app and the last update completely ruined it. Looking for a new app now.

Best meditation app. No ads, although I use it all the time so I have sent them a few donations. The guided meditations are well done and relaxing, I especially love the sleep meditations, particularly the power nap. If you're wanting to try meditation or just looking for a good app, definitely try this one.
Amazing app. It really keeps me going with meditation. I love the "SOS meditations". They are really helping when you are dealing with extreme emotions.
Incredible
I love this app
a literal gem
Its such a wonderful app even free. Everyone can use it easily. If anyone want to be calmer and focused and clearer mind than he/she must download this app and use it.
Best meditation app. Truly free, no paywalls, no trials, no annoying ads. Great quality content and so so much stuff to listen to, including meditation, stories, sounds. Love it so much!
I really want to thank you for this opportunity, it has been a great help
Its free its great
It's perfect glad that I found it.
Came across this when trying to find help with my insomnia and anxiety.Very user friendly.Only done a few sessions but i think it's going to be very helpful.
Good one
Absolutely wonderful app. It being not only free but containing no ads is amazing. It's the only meditation app that has worked for me. Highly highly recommend. :0)
The best meditation app by far. I just wish it had more newer sessions. Great value (it's free!).

This is a really excellent app with quality thinking and quality audio. Kept well up to date and have suffered no glitches at all. No ads is a lovely bonus given the subject. Keeping this app free will be important so donate if you can afford. Really well done üíñ
Amazing app...great way to meditate. Easy to use and great resources.
Medito is amazing and has changed my life in so many ways. It is completely free and has no ads. You can even download the sessions to listen to offline. The best meditation app by far.

This app is AMAZING! I have tried a few others in the past and nothing compares. They have a series of guided meditations to help you learn the basics and grow into the practice, as well as a bunch of sets for more specific types of meditation and everything is free! This really helped me make mediation a habit and I use this app every single day. Would reccomend to anyone!
Great meditation app - for me it's the best! Thank you Medito team - for helping humanity in free!!
Great app. Using it for past 15 days, and the experience is great. No distracting ads Or anything, pure meditation experience without spending a penny. Must try!!

Very good, especially for a 100% free app. I get the sense that the people who created this have a lot of knowledge in the theory of meditation, maybe even moreso than some similar paid apps. There are a lot of sessions, though many of them are similar. Suggestions: 1) More variety and depth; 2) An RPG-style gamification aspect would be really cool; 3) Accept donations via GPlay.
All good, easy to follow & use.
Great app
This is a great free meditation app. The ones I have listened to have shown me a new way to meditate. I still have a lot to grow in meditating but I really recommend this app.
It is hard for me to turn off my mind but the stories put me right to sleep. I don't think I have ever made it to the end of one awake More stories please.
Wonderful app. This has finally helped me to understand how to meditate. The amount of content is amazing and anyone at any level can get something from this. Huge thanks to the developers!
Amazing app I tried it for 2 minutes and it calmed me down even though it was ment to be 5 minutes great app üòÄüòÑüôÇ

I dun need any other meditation app... Amazing work, phenomenal effort and got meditation in so many voices... A full session of mindfulness, gratitude meditations... Power to your team ... Keep them coming.
If you wanna start a consistent meditating habit install this app. That's all I have to say.

I left a review that was actually responded to and I really appreciate that so wanted to leave a better one. I still don't like how the previous background sound plays automatically in the next session but I appreciate their hard work on an app they don't even charge money for. Thank you very much.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kimberley. Thanks for your review and feedback. We'll take it into account and continue to work hard to improve the app üôÇ cheers, Mike

google_play_reviews.content: Just awesome... Install it and enjoy the mindfulness. No doubts. I'd give 6 out of 5 if I can..

Great free, open-source, nonprofit meditation app. Lots of different packs, new daily guided meditations, tons of good ambient sounds, and more! There are occasional reminders to donate, but no hard sell (and I have donated a few times because it's so good).

amazing app. used to go around installing and deleting multiple meditation apps bc i couldnt find the right one and im glad i settled on this one. would be great if theres a morning/freshen up meditation park for us to start the day right
Thank you very much for this wonderful app.

Great completely free, Would be 5 but having trouble downloading a soundscape. It gets about halfway through the download and then I get an error message. I can download shorter versions of sleep soundscapes but not the longer ones.
Love this app
Loud and fast talking. Not relaxing at all.
I have been using medito for several days now. Its a great app to start. Keep up the good work. üòç Suggestion: 1. Can you add "Download full pack" option?
Wonderful app full of great meditations and a 30 day challenge to help stay on track
Love the simplicity and the meditation options available.
My favorite meditation app! Elegant and thoughtful design and I love the getting started classes, as well as the packs.

Edit: Thanks for the reply, I found the music button, great! It's cool, but I miss background music for guided meditations, because this way like 80% of the meditation is just silence, which I can have without the app. üòä
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tijana! Thanks for your review. The background sounds are still there, they have just moved to the player screen. Just tap the sound icon below the play button. Hope that helps üòä - Steven

google_play_reviews.content: I will say that I've only been using this app for two days now as a beginner to meditation, but so far I love it. Everything is absolutely free, and I love the courses that ease you into meditating. I deal with a lot of anxiety, stress, and depression, so I'm hoping this app will help me with that, and with my creative side.

Great app

Great free meditation app. There are specific sessions for different needs, like there is a section for stress and anxiety, there is one for better sleep, there is one section for better focus, etc. I'm practically a beginner and this app guided me very well through the process.

Love Love Love It's how I start my day. I made the mistake of downloading those other apps with the big names you see the commercials for or the common ones you see with all the downloads... and they're not free and as complete as this one. It's got everything I need right here for all my needs. Recommended

I'm really enjoying this app its helping me sleep and helping me relax and cope with my anxiety im really looking forward to keep using it and best of all its free I don't have spare money to buy apps so to find one thats free and really helps and explains how meditation works is amazing thank you üòä
Perfect and free, love how it calmly and logically takes you through the steps of learning how to meditate in an easy and completely stress- free way.

Simply love it! I love the sleep stories. I rarely sleep so even if I don't these help me to relax and stay relaxed. Not always the hard part is kerping it up. The more stressed you get the less you want to mediate but that's the whole point. You gave to be able to focus on something else other than what's stressing you out. I've only been doing this 3 years and it's very hard to do but I really do belive it works. I enjoy it anyways.
Great App

google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Maciek, the bg sounds are on the player screen now so you can preview them. We're going to add a lot more soon so the old view wouldn't have worked.

google_play_reviews.content: An excellent meditation guide. It has really helped me become more relaxed and focused.

Best meditation app yet. Got all the benefits of headspace courses but with alternative simple guided meditations. Love the new layout and just hope that I can stick to it and form a habit. Great work guys

This is seriously exceptional! It is perfect in every way, you really succeeded with this one! I'm blown away with how easy to use it is, and how helpful it is. And that its free! Amazing. I would give this 10 stars if I could. Simply breathtaking.
